website_summaries.verdict: This cloth is lighter weight than many cooling cloths and made from a comfortable mesh material.
pros: Material is lighter weight than others
Stays light and soft when it dries out
Works well to keep you cooler on a hot day
Doesn't take up a lot of room for storage or to take with you on the go
cons: This model does not appear to stay cool for very long
It tends to dry out quicker than others

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot days!!
customer_reviews.text: We went on a family trip to the zoo with our 3 month old. This towel was perfect for keeping her cool all day (in 90 degree weather!). She loved it and would cry when we took it off. It only dried up once and we just stopped at a water fountain and re-wet it and it was cool again! Very happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leane Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not the best....
customer_reviews.text: These were very cute and if it were apart of the outfit per se I would give it 5 stars. But this was meant to keep you cool. I've had another one that was more like a car shammie. This thing was too thin and dried in the sun rather quickly. We were in Florida at Disney and the sun put a beating on this thing. I told my mom keep it and just use it while working in her flowerbeds at home where she can be close to the faucets and keep putting water on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanin girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in a "Bleeding" towel
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! We bought two of these towels and although they did work to cool ourselves (outdoors at the race track), all told, we ruined 4 shirts over the course of two hot days as the dye in the fabric bled into our light colored shirts. No mention of this in the description. Not only disappointed but mad that these towels ruined shirts valued at 8 x's the cost of these bleeding pieces of polyester.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: We like these better than the Frog Togg brand
customer_reviews.text: The Chill Pad is made of a different material than the Frog Togg, and at first I was skeptical, but for the price difference in the two, we were willing to give the Chill Pad a chance. We use these cooling rags while down in Disney during summer, and they are a life saver. The Chill Pad is very lightweight, stores much more easily, and doesn't end up getting the funky musty odor after a weeks worth of usage like we experienced with the Frog Toggs brand. Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig J.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have cooling effect you’re looking for
customer_reviews.text: Only good for moisture wicking, does not stay cold for any length of time. Great for wiping sweat off your face and neck. Would not recommend for what it was advertised for. Does stay wet for a longer time versus a regular towel, so that part is good. Just don’t expect it to cool you down.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this cooling towel. I ordered the first in anticipation of warm weather, and wanting to be outside and comfortable. Before I had a chance to use it, a friend complained about hot flashes, so I gave her my towel and she loved it! Now the weather has cooled, but I still plan to use my new towel and am considering cutting it up and sewing it together for a face protector mask. May be ordering yet another soon.
customer_reviews.author: K J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Long
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a long cooling towel, one that wouldn't work it's way off from my neck when I am moving about outside. This one fits the bill. The fabric is lighter weight than the other brand I have which means that it dries out easier. But I don't mind. I am pretty active during the summer and the length allows me to wipe the sweat from my brow.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool during Pickleball.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It came with a plastic carrying case. I throw ice in there and then my wet cloth. I hang it on my pickleball bag and while I’m playing, the ice starts to melt keeping my cloth super cold. I can use it then dip it back in during the hot Arizona summer and it keeps me cool throughout my two hour games. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. It's so soft and it keeps me feeling cool. I love it. And I'm glad they had it in my favorite color purple!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not getting it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this two times now and I guess I'm just not getting it. I wanted something to wrap around my neck when I'm outside in the heat. It is a nice lightweight towel, so there's some value there. But I don't find it to be particularly cooling. You soak it in water and you have a damp towel, the colder the water the colder the towel. So there is some cooling while it's damp, but I don't get the sense it provides any more cooling than any other damp towel would. Maybe it stays damp longer than other towels? But it really didn't stay damp for very long so I'm not sure that's the case either.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cooling towel. Purchased several kinds to compare and this is my favorite. It is lightweight, easy to fold and pack whether wet or dry, and cools the best of the 4 kinds i purchased. It does dry out quickly in my desert location but I just get it wet again. I also like the longer length to wrap around my neck and tie. My first purchase was one of the blue chamois types but it dries hard and is not fold-able, and if you leave it wet and fold it up, when you open they are moldy...gross. This mesh one is easy to wash and dry and keep sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Longer towel is definitely superior
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver for a recent tennis 2pm playoff match where the forecast was 106 degrees (and even hotter on the courts). Arrived quickly. I have other similar towels which may cost a few dollars less but these are better because they are longer (40 inches instead of 32 inches). This is key because longer towels offer more surface area for cooling. The longer towel is more versatile as it can be tied and worn around your neck during a match if the conditions mandate. Kept mine in a large ziplock with ice + H20 and it was the first thing I grabbed during changeovers. We won!!
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: Generous size, dries soft.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is a great product; good enough that after using it I bought another one for a friend who is going through cancer treatment and often feels flushed/hot. Size matters! This is a generous cut compared to the competition. It dries 'soft' while many out there dry very stiff. The plastic zip packaging doubles as a handy case with carabiner. Cons: The colors of the prints are not true to the photos..... Not horrible, not worth subtracting a star.
customer_reviews.author: kakie

customer_reviews.title: It really works . . .
customer_reviews.text: Received the Chill Pal Mesh Cooling Towel this AM. It's fabulous! It does what it's made to do - to keep you cool for extended periods of time. I become overheated very fast whether indoors or out and living near Phoenix year around doesn't help. I've tried just about everything to stay cool but nothing works long-term. The Chill Pal Mesh Cooling Towel does! It's long enough to drape around your neck but isn't heavy. I bought one for my sister who lives in Maryland and is an avid gardener - I know she'll be happy using the Cooling Towel during the hot humid summers.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I first found out about the chill pall when I received one as a gift. After using it during a recent camping trip where the weather was blazing hot I was sold. Really helps to cool you off, easy to use and lasts a long time. It worked so good I had to buy one for the wife who was using a different cooling towel product and decided she would rather have mine! Thanks for the great service and a great product, highly recommend and definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Island Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Meh. So I didn't feel like these stayed super cool or for very long. There were kinda like any other plain, wet towel. The towel was soft and a good length for various ways to wear it, but nothing special. Maybe because it was so flipping hot, it wasn't possible :)We will still use them, but just have to re-wet them every 15-20 min which I think is more frequently than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used several brands of cooling cloths in the past and none of them seemed to stay cool for long. I purchased the Chill Pal mesh towel and it works wonders. I work in hot conditions and have been telling my co-workers to purchase. Everyone loves it. The size is long so you can wrap it around to tie it or you can just double it up to shorten it. It stays cool for SO long without needing to re-wet it. (Usually about 4 hours). You can leave it on without needing to take it off to "snap" it like a lot of other brands require. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Amusement Parks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help keep the family cool at Florida theme parks in July. The kids weren’t into wearing them at first but when it really got hot they suddenly couldn’t wait to wear one. They definitely helped. Even though it was HOT we were pretty comfortable. We paired it with a personal fan around our necks which didn’t put out a ton of air, but it blowing on the towel kept it even cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Wfd823

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! We live in Az where it can get up to 117. We like to walk our dogs at 6am but it is still getting pretty warm at that time. This am we used our Chill Pal. It really helped!!!! It is very soft where many of these products are firm. My husband likes it because he can cool off his bald head! Will make walking the dogs and outside chores much cooler! I have tried several of these products and this is by far the best! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jan Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before running a half-marathon in Moab, UT, last June. Temps were in the '90's by the time I finally finished, but this baby around my neck kept me from passing out. I had to stop and re-wet it once in 2 hours. It gets cool immediately and the best part is it doesn't get stiff and hard when it dries like some others do. I've used it for hiking and doing yard work as well, a lifesaver in Tucson. I'm going to buy one for my husband and one for my 9-year old daughter, too, because they keep stealing it from me!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty nifty towel
customer_reviews.text: *Whapush!* All you have to do is wet and whip it. This is a pretty nifty towel. It keeps cold very well, especially compared to a regular wash cloth. I use it for when I'm sick and I have a bit of a fever. I'm sure it's be great for when you're out hiking too in warmer weather. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Reid

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool on the hottest days!
customer_reviews.text: This cooling towel is excellent in keeping me cool and avoiding using ac in the summer. I have a limited income, but ok for a reasonable life. It helps a lot. The "snap it" again aspect works well and instantly makes it cool better if it loses effectiveness. Reasonable price. Big enough to go around both your head and neck when it's exceptionally hot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Munroe

customer_reviews.title: best cooling towel on market!!
customer_reviews.text: As a weekly football goer in Arizona this is a must have purchased 3. One for each of my friends who attends games with me and we all sweat profusely in the az summer heat everyone at the games is covered in sweat and we arnt! Highly recommend this towel easy to wash and easy to keep cool will be the only cooling towel I Purchased going forward
customer_reviews.author: GAGALES

customer_reviews.title: Family loved these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife, daughter, and myself for our trip to the Utah National Parks where it was going to be over 100 degrees every day we were there. My wife and daughter raved about these towels. I liked mine too, although in the extreme heat and low humidity, I thought it dried out fast. When I didn't ring out the towel too much, it worked better for me. For the price, we thought these towels worked great with dealing with the Utah heat.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Chill Pal Cooling Towels do the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of the chill pal cooling towels in preparation for the 2019 Minnesota Ragnar Relay. I knew that we were going to have to use them because Minnesota in August can be dreadfully hot. To prepare the towels, I placed them in a small cooler with ice and water, to ensure that they were ready to go. They did not let us down! We were able to keep our cool on the hot course. I definitely would recommend these to anyone who needs to keep their cool on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something to help keep me cool while working in the yard and gardening in the middle of the summer heat (the heat index was 110-115 degrees!). This product was completely useless! It never got very cold to begin with and the moment it touched your warm skin it became warm too. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Relief for hot summer days
customer_reviews.text: I live in hot and very humid Virginia. I give tours during the day and in the evening. This has been a life saver in keeping me cooler. The weight is light and it feels really good. I like the pouch and D-ring so you can take it off for awhile and then put it back on. Great product! Bought more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not meet my expectations, didn’t cool me off much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fl Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: It does indeed get cold and stay that way, but I’m not convinced it’s any better than a standard hand towel. It is thinner and lighter, but otherwise unimpressive.
customer_reviews.author: SarahBP

customer_reviews.title: it is great.
customer_reviews.text: Our transmission rebuilder has it on since I got it - weather in South Jersey is so humid & hot this month. He uses it as a head band/wrap to help keep the sweat coming into his eyes. It works well. There are large fans in his area which help to keep the cooling effect activated. I instructed him on how to first wash the towel and then wring it out and snap to activate the coolness in the fibers. So far, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay as cold as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm of Irish heritage and I don't do well with summertime heat. I bought this towel in hopes it would keep me cool. Despite re-applying cold water to the towel several times throughout the day, it didn't seem to do much of anything on a hot summer day of playing golf. It just made me wet.
customer_reviews.author: K. O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Weak packaging
customer_reviews.text: The towel works fine, it's just a towel after all. I took off a star for the pouch. I know it's not the product itself, but since it is resealable and clearly intended to be reusable I consider it part of the product. The pouch is kind of brittle and wears out easily. I only used it 3-4 times and it tore so it no longer held water. I replaced it with a regular Ziploc bag and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these for use on two safaris in southern Africa in December of this year. I'll give a practical review after that. In the meantime, I'm really impressed with the quality and feel of these after the initial wash in cold water in the washing machine. I'll update after December.
customer_reviews.author: P. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I like to run a few miles before body pump class ...
customer_reviews.text: I've waited a couple of weeks after getting this to write a review. When I first received it and tried it I wasn't impressed, I didn't seem that cooling. Then I took it to spin class and waiting until we had made through a couple of songs and then put it around my neck, it was fabulous, I kept wiping my face with the ends and it was so refreshing. I like to run a few miles before body pump class and I waited to use it after the run and it really helped cool me down before body pump. So after a couple of weeks I can say I love it and am so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Darla L Good

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS YOU COOL
customer_reviews.text: It actually cools and it does what it states. It kinda like when you go to an amusement park and you get wet a bit and you feel the cooling effects when you walk around. The difference is that you aren’t WEARING WET CLOTHES but a wet cloth which you can keep wetting to keep the cooling effect. I guess I coulda made my own wet “towel” using a lighter fabric. But this is a convenience.
customer_reviews.author: LIVE ALOHA

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Delivered on time and my son loves these. He works outside in 100 degree temperatures and was always complaining of heat exhaustion. He often had to leave work due to the heat. He is now keeping cooler and the great thing about this product is that it is machine washable and can be quickly reactivated with a quick rinse and soak then SNAP!!!! It cool and refreshing again. On a final note I want to thank the seller for wonderful customer service. He sent me an awesome follow up email to ensure I was satisfied, offered tips and has ensured my loyalty as a repeat customer. Great job and product.
customer_reviews.author: Rpger

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from the Florida 103° Florida heat
customer_reviews.text: The Chill Pal absolutely saved our sanity when my family and I went to the Disney theme parks in the dead heat of July. The cloth is soft and easy to store (the packaging that it came with was perfect for keeping our stuff dry when on the water rides). It was AMAZING how cold the towel was after snapping it a few times. I bought both the Chill Pal and the Frog Toggs. I ended throwing away the Frog Toggs because it was too much to maintain and it barely worked. I will definitely buy another Chill Pal. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: busy_mom

customer_reviews.title: Best cooling towel I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mesh cooling towel I've ever purchased. It keeps you cool it stays cool for very long time to get it wet snap it out instantly activates. It's better than advertised and I'm going to be purchasing quite a few for teammates. Again this is an amazing product. It's the perfect size wraps around the neck the head there's so many different ways to wrap it around it's just amazing all around.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent towel!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tested out these cooling towels this weekend during a hot Texas day at Sea World. We were very pleased with how this towel kept us feeling cool which was important especially to me since I'm pregnant. Easy directions too! Would definitely recommend to buy to keep you cool on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cool it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooling towel. I don't exercise much..haha. But I do sweat, especially in the warmer months, but ever in the winter when I do heavy household chores. So this towel comes in very handy. Just wash first with your regular laundry, wet and wring out before use, snap and ready to use. Snap again to reactivate to cooling power. It helps me keep the air conditioner on a lower speed. Great for if your exercising or any activity where you sweat and want to cool down. I love the size. It's 12" by 40. So about as long as 2 dish towels in you sewed them together. Fits nicely around the neck. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Norton

customer_reviews.title: This Chill Pal really works !!
customer_reviews.text: Decided instead of wrapping it around my neck to place it over my head then down the back and sides of my neck. Worked well to keep head and neck cool but it kept parting in the back area so I had the back part sewn up to form a hood. This works incredibly well. Chill Pal easily absorbs water the quickly evaporates like a swamp cooler . Hiking in dry hot Phoenix AZ area. Joe
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Expectations may have been too high. I was expecting an actual "cool" sensation. All I felt was a wet towel. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, just a regular towel
customer_reviews.text: Works like any regular towel. It didn't keep us extra cool while out in the heat and we used all 4 on different people.. We didn't notice any difference between the ones we ordered and regular thin towels. Dries quickly which is nice we don't have to worry about mold
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Staying cool at Disney
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for our July 2019 Disney trip. They were perfect and much cheaper than the Disney ones sold in the parks the size is good and it did wonders for cooling us off on really hot days. These will be used on all our hot trips. They are durable and the colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Item was received in just a couple days, nicely packaged and better than expected. It's a perfect size for working out and keeps me cool. Don't hesitate in buying this!
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling towel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 4 day archery tournament in the August heat. This really helped keep the heat at bay and was super easy to cool and re-cool when needed. Great purchase and I love that it came with a storage bag and carabiner clip. Hooked very easily to her quiver so we didn't have to worry about misplacing it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M

customer_reviews.title: Great to tamp down the summer heat.  Great for golfers and tennis players.
customer_reviews.text: These towels are so pleasantly cooling. They offset any danger of heat exhaustion. I take three with me in my cooler and I replace one as soon as the other thaws. Use it around the head and neck. It usually lasts me a whole round of golf 18 holes.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia H

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my pregnant wife who has been overheating anytime the mercury gets over 75. I don't quite understand the instructions to 'snap' this to activate cooling although I assume this just helps to make the towel moist instead of sopping wet. It lasts for a good hour before she needs to go and dunk it again but this is a life saver for her on hot days when we're outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Heat relief that works
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Master Gardener, volunteering at University of Nevada Cooperative Extension community garden. We meet twice a week in the summer to work in the garden. Temperature in Las Vegas is brutal 100+ most days. I tried the cooling towel and was very pleased with the heat relief it provided. I have talked it up with other volunteers and they have all found it to be a big help in fighting the heat. Very highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Kambiss

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you nice and cool!
customer_reviews.text: I took this to Orlando (Universal) and it was so helpful in keeping me cool...and it gets HOT there. I kept it around my neck for most of our time outdoors. It even helps to cover your shoulders when the sun is extra harsh, and if you're worried about getting sunburned. Can't wait to use on any other hot outdoor adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Works great for baby
customer_reviews.text: I love using this towel for my baby when we're outside during the summer! It works just like it claims and I love the color/pattern too. Length is good for adult to put over their shoulders and I can easily wrap around my baby to keep him cool all over.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Totally not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I expected more of a definitely chill but didn't feel any different than a wet towel. I even soaked in ice cold water thinking it might make a difference but no. I reread instructions to make sure I was doing ut right. Don't get me wrong it helps in the heat but as I said a wet towel would do the same.
customer_reviews.author: momamia

customer_reviews.title: Chillin with my Chill Pal
customer_reviews.text: I received my Chill Pal as a gift from my husband and it works well. Light weight and provides a refreshing chilling effect during my hot walks and looking forward to using it during my next golf round. Once the Chill Pal is dry, it is soft and light weight, easy to pack for storage and next use.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Keeps you cool as long as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself to try during summer months. Loved it. Keeps you cool as long as it stays wet. It does dry quickly, so you need to keep water handy for resetting towel. But it works great.
customer_reviews.author: workski

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this as I was working an outdoor job in the summer, it stayed cool for long periods of time and made my days easier. It was a coworker that first suggested it. I now continue to use this as I am working out.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: This product does what marketing states it will do!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a Chill Pal for my husband. He loved it so much he bought more. Fast forward to a very hot summer day - I'm weeding a garden, directly under the sun, and my husband puts a Chill Pal around my neck. What a difference it made to my comfort level. It was so successful that I bought a couple more (they really are a great value at a very low cost) and when I work out, one is wrapped around my neck and the other is hanging on the side of the equipment, ready to wipe my face. I've recommended this product to friends and family and they have been pleased, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sueskind

customer_reviews.title: it's being used inside of a closed room that's upwards of 110 degrees most of the time and doesn't have the best air circulation
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly simple fix! Gotta say it actually works. In my case, it's being used inside of a closed room that's upwards of 110 degrees most of the time and doesn't have the best air circulation. In those conditions, you may find yourself re-cooling the towel (you have to snap it) frequently, but as promised, each time it comes back it's pleasantly cool to the touch. Glad I purchased it, it definitely beats listening to my bones melt.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Paul

customer_reviews.title: Kept us cool while touring Petra
customer_reviews.text: Today we hiked through the ruins of Petra. In August it is a tad warm there, so we came equipped with chill towels. I had gotten five for each person in our group. We refreshed them with water throughout the day and everyone was happy and stayed cool. I kept my towels a little on the wet side, wrapping it around my neck and tucking it in the front and back. My shirt got wet which felt great.
customer_reviews.author: A3ftv

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have some health issues and often times feel like I'm going to faint (and actually have). I keep this with me and dip it in water or put it under running water, if nearby and put it on my back of my neck and it truly helps. I also use it during physical therapy and exercise so I don't get overheated. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: It Works. Gotta Love Smart Science
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am loving the cooling towel. It kept cool wrapped around on a 90 degree day for about 45 minutes before I refreshed it at a water fountain. My body temp usually runs between 97.5 and 98. The other day, I still had the cloth draped over the back of my neck when a nurse took my temperature with a contact thermometer that swipes across the head and jaw, not in contact with where the cloth had been. The thermometer read 96.5. Because the cloths were inexpensive, I also bought them for my daughters to keep them safe and comfortable this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: No more shocking the system
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for spmeome, as they work outside a lot and never take care of themsself as well as they should. To the point once it was excruciatingly hot out and after working, for some reason they decide to take a cold shower. Which sent them to the hospital as one would imagine. Now with this, that is so much less likely, and it does a fantastic job at that.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Keeping cool while working outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Good sizing and even better it gets the job done. This was a gift for my husband who is a big and tall guy and needs the extra width and length after researching sizes this was the best fit. When he tried it on a beautiful hot day it outperformed his expectations. For me it was a great gift at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time yesterday. My AC no longer works in my car. So I used the towel, it worked great. The temperature outside was around 100 degrees, the heat index was even higher.This helped so much, I was able to tolerate the heat. I bought the icool cooling towel last year, it is a piece of garbage. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: D. Laird

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose cook down tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these during a recent heatwave. An easy way to get a cool down and remove sweat. Useful in the car when you carry a water bottle as so many of us do now. Good for small dogs that don’t tolerate the heat well. Can use it to wrap around things that need to be kept cool in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: TCW

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and pattern. Super cool(ing)
customer_reviews.text: This towel is awesome. I've used it for a work out and it helps cool you off. I can't wait to use it in the summer. I love the floral/Hawaiian looking pattern that appears when the towel is wet. I might need a few more of these to make sure I have one at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kirien Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling towel!
customer_reviews.text: This cooling towel works good. Now don’t expect it to feel cold against your skin...it works thru evaporation which cools you down as the water evaporates. It took me a while to understand what it was doing because I expected it to be cold to the touch. I am pleased with the towel because it does exactly what it’s suppoed to.
customer_reviews.author: PCF

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cool for very long.
customer_reviews.text: I wound up putting it in the refrigerator freezer, to extend the cooling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and dries fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cloth to have on hand in sweaty conditions. I have used it kayaking to cover my legs (prevent burning), to wipe off sweat, and also to make wet to cool myself. Washes well and dries so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary  "macraw"

customer_reviews.title: this has been his favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is for a baseball player. The temperature gets to be 100+ sometimes when they are playing. We have tried other towels, but they dry out stiff or smell odd. So far, this has been his favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya A

customer_reviews.title: cooling towels
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift to my grandson who is going to spend the Summer in a hot humid climate. I am going to visit him there, so I kept one for myself, and one for my daughter (his mother). I'm sure they will work great.
customer_reviews.author: angiemarie shumway

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective cooling
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this cooling towel. Used it today for walking downtown (June, Bay Area CA) for 3 hours. Around my neck and tucked into the front of my blouse. Some moisture wicked into my clothing, no problem. Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Let's Go

customer_reviews.title: Works great, ended up buying 2 more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Europe trip and it was a lifesave! Super lightweight, easy to use and actually works! Keep the towels cool and refreshing without being wet/damp. When dry I would just tie to to my purse. I would wrap around my neck, drap it on my legs or arms. Super versatile. Just looks like a scarf!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: When you first get it, it works great...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I initially ordered and received this product, so I ended up purchasing 3. Little did I know, after a handful of uses it no longer gets "cool" or stays wet. I'm disappointed (wasted money) and will not be ordering anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. The length (42") was perfect for draping around the neck or even fashioning into a headband or cap of sorts. Light weight. I used it within 24 hours of receiving it. Wore it on the golf course on an extremely humid 91 degree sunny day. I re-wetted it four times over the course of four hours. The fabric allows for good evaporation and resulting cooling. Very packable. I ordered the Mahogany -- which in itself could serve as a simple scarf for airplane wear or neck wrap when worn dry in a cool or drafty place.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the original PVA cooling towel from Chill Pal, but what turned me off from that towel was the stiffness when it dried. This mesh towel does not do that at all. It is super soft and still becomes very cold as it dries. It is very thin and also fairly large: large enough to wrap around your head or wear it like a scarf. Unlike the original PVA towel, it is easy to store. You can fold it up and store it back in the case it came in when it is dry. The case even comes with a small carabiner for attaching to a case/backpack. Definitely a 5/5 product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bains-Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably cool, easy to maintain!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Chill Pal for a few years, and use it frequently. It retains it's shape, color and softness well. The concept is simple, the fabric is perfect, delivery was excellent, and the price certainly reasonable. I like the product so much, I bought it as a gift for my daughter, ... who also confirms it works well for her. Thanks for a neat product!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Mike

customer_reviews.title: Keep moist and stay Cool
customer_reviews.text: I live where it is 100 plus most days sure help me stay cool. Awesome Towel unfortunately I lost the first one after having day so I had to order another. I was sent another Towel and may I say the customer service went way above and beyond What you would expect great awesome service
customer_reviews.author: Eric Almgren

customer_reviews.title: A great cool purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the Chill Pal. I have other a different brand but this is the best by far. I is a soft cooling fabric. You can't go wrong. don't be fooled by getting a cheaper one remember you get what you pay for and I live mine. sorry I did not get several.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Ah...cool
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised...and so fun to snap (especially if it's not wrung out completely and you snap towards your working partners). We got another brand as well - this one is noticeably cooler, and stays cool for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: ruraltraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Beat the Heat!
customer_reviews.text: I was in Baltimore this past weekend for a baseball game and the heat index was at 112 degrees. I brought the cooling towel with me and dunked in our melted ice that was in the cooler. It helped so much! Had to dunk it again only once more during the game. The key is really if there is airflow/a breeze. If it's not breezy at all or you aren't using cold water, it might not feel as nice. Definitely will use this again for another hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Chill Pad Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: Used the cooling towel for getting into a hot car and keeping it on until whole body cooled down after strenuous activity. Used for first time on Saturday when coming from long awaited yoga session in a local new place. Great product!!! I will pass the word to anyone about this much needed and appreciated invention!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Cooling Towel Available!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooling towel! There are a lot of different cooling towels out there but this is the best you can get. Buy with confidence. Well made and great packaging for storage when not in use. Excellent communication from seller.
customer_reviews.author: J S Keel

customer_reviews.title: Effective cooling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and definitely effective! I walk outside alot, and often in non-shaded areas. This, draped over my head and spread to my shoulders, makes a huge difference in my level of comfort in hot, humid days.
customer_reviews.author: Marla S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Handkerchiefs and such don't stay cool very long and last time I went to the lake, I got sick from being so hot despite regularly trying to dip a cloth in cold cooler water to stay cool. This will be much more effective and it lasts longer and more comfortable too. Now, I just need more of them for the family.
customer_reviews.author: sunsetatdawn

customer_reviews.title: These works great but so did the much cheaper brand I also tried (that came in a 6 pack.)
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My only complaint is that the pack of 6 cheaper cooling towels that I also bought, worked just as well. My elderly dad doesn't do well in the heat of summer and this worked great.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep you cool on those too hot days
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my husband who drives heavy equipment. He sets this and either puts it under his hard hat or around his neck and it really cools him down on those hot days over the summer!
customer_reviews.author: TMCCAC

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I used it for a Disney World trip
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I used it for a Disney World trip, when it was 95° F here in Florida. I'm thinking of getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bullard

customer_reviews.title: It’s not 4, it’s only one.
customer_reviews.text: I did a search for a 4-pack of cooling towels. This item came up first with 4 towels pictured and 4 colors to choose from. I ordered a set of blue towels and received one towel. Totally deceived on this advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Uszynski

customer_reviews.title: It actually worked
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts, but it actually worked. I really put it to the test over the weekend during a sand volleyball tournament where i was in the 96 degree baking hot sun for 4 hours straight, and it kept me cool. I didn't overheat at all like I am prone to doing. I do feel you should re-wet it every chance you get - that's what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Have another model that's more like a sponge. This one does not stay cool even when I put it in the fridge the night before. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GOOZIEMOM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps us cool when hiking!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I enjoy hiking, but not being hot and sweaty while doing it. I bought these Chill Pal towels for us to use on longer hikes, and they work great! They stay nice and cool, and keep us cool. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat94

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something ground breaking, but all I got was a towel that Im supposed to keep wet while wrapped around my neck. I could do this with any old towel i have laying around. I regret this purchase so much
customer_reviews.author: Sal Undy

customer_reviews.title: The towels are long enough to pull over your neck to a new cool spot.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the kool pal towels for keeping my friends and me cool while marching in a hot Texas August parade. We are Plungettes, a group of mostly over 65 women who march and do routines with very clean plungers. The towels were wonderful. We especially liked the ability to wipe the sweat off our faces and out of our eyes. I loved the color but the only negative comment I heard was, “You should have ordered red.”
customer_reviews.author: Andra

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to attend the WCWS in OKC and they were a great help to overcome the heat and humidity in OKC. We wet them and snapped them and had cool relief from the heat. I highly recommend them if you are going to be outside.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and stays cool
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. Previous ones I have purchased were too short. I put on before went to bed and it worked for many, many hours. Very pleased with it. Going to use tomorrow doing yard work in 80+ weather. Thinking about buying one for my dog. Ones I bought a little tight and she got it off and hid it almost right away. Still haven't found it!
customer_reviews.author: Ballard girl

customer_reviews.title: Not a cure for throat cancer but it helped!
customer_reviews.text: After every daily radiation treatment for throat cancer, these Chill Pal towels helped cool my neck back down so I could rest easier.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooking rag
customer_reviews.text: We took this to a mission camp for our daughter who gets very hot/itchy when outside in heat. It worked wonderfully! The purple is a beautiful, deep color. Dries well. Stays cool a long time
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for our amusement parks trip!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for our trip to Disney...SO glad we did. Extremely helpful. When they start drinking out, just find a sink to replenish. Wet them down, put it their pouch, stick in the freezer the night before. Disney selling exact same kind of thing, with logo, for $18/ea.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fogarty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for in between my son’s hockey games. It’s been a huge help in cooking him down. It’s easy to use and it came with a carrying pouch and clip so it can just clip on his hockey bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J.

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome, performed as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Today was my first opportunity to use this cooling towel while working out. It was awesome, performed as advertised. I will always take one (or even two) of these with me when I go to work out. I also know it will become a regular part of my outdoor attire on a regular basis. It will feel great when mowing the grass or working out in the yard. Thanks Matthew, for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mysell

product_meta.title: Chill Pal Mesh Cooling Towel (Blue, 12 x 40 inch)
feature_bullets: ★ A DIFFERENT WAY TO STAY COOL – We’ve taken what we already know about staying cool, and changed things up a bit! The Chill Pal Mesh Cooling Towel utilizes a thinner, comfy, and amazingly breathable design to keep you cool! So to all you golfers, runners, hikers, and more: beat the heat anytime with Chill Pal!

★ WHY MESH? – It’s soft, comfortable, and light on the skin. What’s more, our built in evaporative technology keeps the cloth colder longer than the rest. Best of all, our “dry-soft” mesh design makes it easy to fold down, and it is easy to pack away.

★ BIGGER AND BETTER – With more overall area, you’ll have more evaporative power to work with. Simply put, you get to stay cooler even in the longest of summer days! Worry less about keeping cool, and enjoy actually being cool, with Chill Pal!

★ SIMPLE TO USE – It’s easy: soak, wring out, and enjoy! When it’s about staying cool and beating the heat, nothing beats our fantastic Mesh Cooling Towel. Better still, it comes with it’s very own carry pouch for easy transport.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,050 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
